mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CHATBOT_CHATTING_NO) FROM CHATBOT_INQUIRIES ci WHERE ci.CHATBOT_CHATTING_INDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1' DAY - INTERVAL '1' SECOND
SELECT COUNT(rb.REPORT_NO) FROM REPORT_BOARD rb JOIN REPORT_RESOLUTION rr ON rb.REPORT_NO = rr.REPORT_NO WHERE rr.REPORT_RESOLUTION_PUNISH IS NULL

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN period = 'Day' THEN total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS today_sales, SUM(CASE WHEN period = 'Month' THEN total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS tomonth_sales, SUM(CASE WHEN period = 'Year' THEN total_amount ELSE 0 END) AS toyear_sales FROM ( SELECT 'Day' AS period, SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS total_amount FROM PAYMENT_HISTORY ph WHERE ph.PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1' DAY - INTERVAL '1' SECOND AND (PAYMENT_STATE = 'Completed' OR PAYMENT_STATE = 'Cancel Requested') GROUP BY 'Day' UNION ALL SELECT 'Month' AS period, SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS total_amount FROM PAYMENT_HISTORY ph WHERE ph.PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM') AND TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '1' DAY - INTERVAL '1' SECOND AND (PAYMENT_STATE = 'Completed' OR PAYMENT_STATE = 'Cancel Requested') GROUP BY 'Month' UNION ALL SELECT 'Year' AS period, SUM(PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS total_amount FROM PAYMENT_HISTORY ph WHERE ph.PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (PAYMENT_STATE = 'Completed' OR PAYMENT_STATE = 'Cancel Requested' OR PAYMENT_STATE = 'Cancel Denied') GROUP BY 'Year' ) periods

WITH weeks AS ( SELECT LEVEL AS week_of_month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 8 ) SELECT NVL(SUM(PH.PAYMENT_AMOUNT), 0) AS thisMonthSales FROM weeks W LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_HISTORY PH ON W.week_of_month = TO_CHAR(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM'), 'WW') + 1 AND PH.PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{firstDayOfMonth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (PAYMENT_STATE = 'Completed' OR PAYMENT_STATE = 'Cancel Requested' OR PAYMENT_STATE = 'Cancel Denied') GROUP BY W.week_of_month ORDER BY week_of_month ASC

WITH months AS ( SELECT LEVEL AS month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) SELECT NVL(SUM(PH.PAYMENT_AMOUNT), 0) AS thisYearSales FROM months M LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_HISTORY PH ON M.month = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM')) AND TO_CHAR(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{thisYear} AND (PAYMENT_STATE = 'Completed' OR PAYMENT_STATE = 'Cancel Requested' OR PAYMENT_STATE = 'Cancel Denied') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY'), M.month ORDER BY M.MONTH ASC

WITH weeks AS ( SELECT LEVEL AS week_of_month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 8 ) SELECT NVL(SUM(PH.PAYMENT_AMOUNT), 0) AS thisMonthSales FROM weeks W LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_HISTORY PH ON W.week_of_month = TO_CHAR(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'WW') - TO_CHAR(TRUNC(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM'), 'WW') + 1 AND PH.PAYMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{firstDayOfMonth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{today}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_STATE = 'Canceled' GROUP BY W.week_of_month ORDER BY week_of_month ASC

WITH months AS ( SELECT LEVEL AS month FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) SELECT NVL(SUM(PH.PAYMENT_AMOUNT), 0) AS thisYaerSales FROM months M LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_HISTORY PH ON M.month = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM')) AND TO_CHAR(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{thisYear} AND PAYMENT_STATE = 'Canceled' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PH.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY'), M.month ORDER BY M.MONTH ASC
